HERO.TITLE:
Find your
lost pet
HERO.SUBTITLE:
Or help other families
find theirs
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Looky is a collaborative app that allows you to quickly and accurately report lost or found dogs and cats, so that users who are nearby will help you to return them home. It is your chance to help and bring back happiness to people and pets. It's free and very easy to use!

HOME.INTRO:
What is Looky?

Looky is an Android app (coming soon to iOS) that allows you to easily and quickly publish the report of lost and found pets, to help them to return home.

Features

  • Filter search
  • Location of the pet in Google Maps
  • Real-time pet published notification
  • Live chat
  • Share on social networks

Get the app.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: 404 Page not found
NOT_FOUND.COPY: Sorry. The requested URL {{ value }} was not found on this server.

SEARCH.TITLE: Find reports in your area
SEARCH.DESCRIPTION: You can track down pets that are lost or found by others according to your location.

LOCATION.TITLE: Instant notifications
LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Application users in the zone will receive an immediate alert notification once each report is generated.

MESSAGES.TITLE: Real time messages
MESSAGES.DESCRIPTION: Interact with other users in real time through the messaging system, so you can get in touch with the people who generated the reports.

PETS.TITLE: Pet reports
PETS.DESCRIPTION: Generates reports of lost or found dogs or cats, with a very simple form based on their characteristics, photograph and exact location.

SHARE.TITLE: Sharing is caring
SHARE.DESCRIPTION: Share on social networks reports of pets so that more people will find out and help bring them home.

LOVE.TITLE: We need your help
LOVE.DESCRIPTION: It is not necessary to have a lost pet to use Looky, your help will serve to bring happiness to many people and their pets. Download it now!

SHARE.TITLE: Share
SHARE.PET_LOST_CAPTION: {{ value }} has been lost in {{ city }}
SHARE.PET_FOUND_CAPTION: A {{ value }} pet has been found in {{ city }}
